mapper.select: select id id, createTime createTime, updateTime updateTime, mobileno mobileno, verifycode verifycode, status usedStatus, userId userId from paito_verifymsg where mobileno = #{mobileno} ORDER BY createTime DESC
mapper.insert: insert into paito_verifymsg (mobileno,createTime,updateTime , status, verifycode, userId) values (#{mobileno}, now(), now(), #{usedStatus}, #{verifycode}, userId)
